languages.text: "Ставлю на культ. В заварушках, в которых я оказываюсь, чаще всего виноват какой-нибудь культ".
"I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."
languages.original_text: "Ставлю на культ. В заварушках, в которых я оказываюсь, чаще всего виноват какой-нибудь культ".

traits.locale_text: "My money is on a cult. The kerfuffles I get into usually involve a cult of some description."
"My money is on a cult. The kerfuffles I get into usually involve a cult of some description."
"My money is on a cult. The kerfuffles I get into usually involve a cult of some description."
"My money is on a cult. The kerfuffles I get into usually involve a cult of some description."
"I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."
"I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

languages.text: "Ich würde wetten, dass das ein Kult ist. Wenn ich in Schwierigkeiten gerate, ist meistens irgendein Kult beteiligt."
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde wetten, dass das ein Kult ist. Wenn ich in Schwierigkeiten gerate, ist meistens irgendein Kult beteiligt."

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à parier qu'il s'agit d'une secte. C'est bien souvent la cause de mes problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à parier qu'il s'agit d'une secte. C'est bien souvent la cause de mes problèmes. »

languages.text: 「これは教団だと{mf|俺|私}は踏んでいる。{mf|俺|私}が巻き込まれる厄介ごとは、たいてい何らかの教団が絡んでいるんだ」
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

traits.locale_text: 「これは教団だと{mf|俺|私}は踏んでいる。{mf|俺|私}が巻き込まれる厄介ごとは、たいてい何らかの教団が絡んでいるんだ」

languages.text: «Apostaría a que se trata de un culto. La mayoría de mis problemas involucran cultos de algún tipo».
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

traits.locale_text: «Apostaría a que se trata de un culto. La mayoría de mis problemas involucran cultos de algún tipo».

languages.text: “我敢打赌，这肯定和邪教脱不开关系。我遇到过的所有麻烦，通常都有邪教在后面搞鬼。”
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

traits.locale_text: “我敢打赌，这肯定和邪教脱不开关系。我遇到过的所有麻烦，通常都有邪教在后面搞鬼。”

languages.text: "Her iddiasına varım, kesin tarikat bunlar. Başıma ne geldiyse hep tarikatlardan geldi."
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this is a cult. The predicaments I get into usually involve a cult of some description."

traits.locale_text: "Her iddiasına varım, kesin tarikat bunlar. Başıma ne geldiyse hep tarikatlardan geldi."
